description:
Fully supports the IEC104 protocol, creates multiple connections at the same time, simulates multiple slave stations, and quickly builds your test platform.


- [New] Support batch opening and closing of connections
- [New] Support automatic configuration changes for single-point information, double-point information, and step position information
- [New] Added linear and random easing functions
- [Fixed] Fixed the problem of repeated burst message sending when resetting data
